member.name: T:ALIVE.AliveObject
member.summary: The most basic type of ALIVE object, akin to a Second Life Primitive

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.family
member.summary: This represents the kind of AliveObject this is, for example Tree, House, Wall, Ball, Cube It is stored on the Description slot of the object as created in the virtual world

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.ID
member.summary: 64 bit Global ID (unique across the virtual world)

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.LocalID
member.summary: 32 bit Local ID (unique within the current region) Although public, this is for internal use only.

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.X
member.summary: X coordinate within current region

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.Y
member.summary: Y coordinate within current region

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.shape
member.summary: Primitive type (see primType)

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.movable
member.summary: Can the Prim be picked up or moved?

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.color
member.summary: String representing one of the colors: red, blue, green, yellow, aqua, purple, black, white Other colors are not represented here and appear as "unknown"

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.name
member.summary: Name of the AliveObject as it appears in-world, for example $ball3

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.angle
member.summary: Rotation of the primary face of the Prim around the vertical axis in degrees, measured counter-clockwise from due East.

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.width
member.summary: Size of the Primitive in 3 dimensions

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.depth
member.summary: Size of the Primitive in 3 dimensions

member.name: F:ALIVE.AliveObject.height
member.summary: Size of the Primitive in 3 dimensions

member.name: M:ALIVE.AliveObject.#ctor(OpenMetaverse.Primitive)
member.summary: The most basic type of ALIVE object, akin to a Second Life Primitive

member.name: M:ALIVE.AliveObject.toString
member.summary: Returns a printable description of Prim attributes

member.name: T:ALIVE.SmartDog
member.summary: Object which represents an avatar in ALIVE/OpenMetaverse/SecondLife

members.member: Construct a new Bot first name last name password>

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.Login
member.summary: Attempt to log the avatar into the default region

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.Logout
member.summary: Log the avatar out

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.TurnTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Rotate the avatar to face a specified location

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.TurnLeft(System.Int64)
member.summary: Rotate the avatar counter-clockwise

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.TurnRight(System.Int64)
member.summary: Rotate the avatar clockwise

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.GoForward(System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempt to walk the avatar forward in a straight line. Obstacles may prevent this from completing as expected

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.GoBackward(System.Int32)
member.summary: Attempt to walk the avatar backwards in a straight line. Obstacles may prevent this from completing as expected

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.GoTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Go to the specified location.
member.remarks: This is not very reliable, in Second Life, or in ALIVE, and can result in the avatar getting stuck. Use with caution. This routine returns after the time taken to travel this distance, assuming a travel speed of 3 meters per second.
member.param: X coordinate of location to attempt to travel to
Y coordinate of location to attempt to travel to
member.returns: True or false depending on whether the location was reached (within a margin of error of 0.8 meters - from experimental data)

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.Coordinates(System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Return the coordinates of the avatar (in meters) within a 256 by 256 meter Simulator region as floating point values. X is due East, and Y is due North.

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.ZrotFromQuaternion(OpenMetaverse.Quaternion)
member.summary: Given a Quaternion, return the rotation around the Z (vertical) axis in degrees.
member.remarks: Angles are measured counterclockwise from due East

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.Orientation
member.summary: Return rotation of bot avatar in degrees clockwise from Due North
member.remarks: (due North is zero, results are from 0 to 360)

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.ObjectsAround(System.Single)
member.summary: Return a list of AliveObjects found within a specified radius
member.param: The radius (in meters) within which to look

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.ObjectsAround
member.summary: Return a List of AliveObjects within a radius of 10 meters

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.DropObject(ALIVE.AliveObject)
member.summary: Drop the specified object near where the avatar is standing

members.member: We will use "attach" to pick up an object by carrying it by hand, i.e. attach to left or right hand AliveObject to be picked up

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.GetMessage
member.summary: Get all the instant messages from the World Master since last checking

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.SayMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Send the specified message to the World Master
member.param: The message to send World Master

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.GetChat
member.summary: Get the messages in local chat since last checking
member.remarks: Local chat is within a 20 meter radius
member.returns: A string containing messages seen in local chat, including your own.
member.remarks: Messages include your own chat, and begin with avatar name colon

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.SayChat(System.String)
member.summary: Say the specified message in local chat
member.remarks: Local chat is heard within a 20 meter radius

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.GetObjectProps(ALIVE.AliveObject)
member.summary: List the names of ALIVE properties of object
member.param: Primitive whose properties are to be returned

member.name: M:ALIVE.SmartDog.GetObjProp(ALIVE.AliveObject,System.String)
member.summary: Return the value of the named property for this Prim
